finalizeAuction().details: Can be called by anyone after reveal period ends

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.bucket: The bucket index (0-5) for heatmap - must match actual bid amount
params.deposit: Amount of HASH to deposit (must be >= actual bid)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimUnrevealedDeposit(uint256).notice: Claim back deposit if bid was not revealed

feedJackpot(uint256).notice: Receive jackpot contribution from other games

getBucket(uint256).notice: Get bucket for a given amount

getBucketCounts().notice: Get all bucket counts for current auction (for heatmap)

hasBid(address).notice: Check if user has bid in current auction
